name: EcoFin Media
tag_list: financial-literacy, conent-development, spanish, hispanic, latino, multimedia, white-label-content, content-syndication
overview:
EcoFin Media develops high quality financial literacy content for print, television, radio and the web. We work both in English and Spanish, providing culturally relevant content that speaks directly to target audiences.

We market our own products and also develop private-label content.

Our mission is to empower individuals to make sound financial decisions for themselves. Our content is developed with a friendly, engaging style that informs but does not intimidate.

Despite the large quantity of information on personal finance and entrepreneurship currently available in the marketplace, the vast majority fails to connect with the intended audience.

EcoFin Media is changing that.

We have a proven formula for developing financial literacy content in multiple formats that educates, entertains and inspires.

Clients work with us in various fashions, including:

* Content licensing;
* Original content development on a private-label basis;
* Co-production; and
* Joint ventures.
